description:
Focus on Editing, remove All Other Unnecessary Distractions.

### Install

You can force x86 (32bit) installation on 64 bit systems:

```
choco install wiznotelite --x86
```

### Features

#### Live Preview Mode

No need to switch to preview mode or split the screen. What you input is what you mean.

#### Various Syntax Support

Apply rich styles on text, drag and drop an image, or insert a table. You could also draw diagrams such as Gutt Diagram or Flow Chart.

#### Offline or Sync, Your Choice

The data saved in a local folder. After signing in with your WizNote account, all notes will upload. If you have a private server, switch to it.
author: Beijing Wozhi Technology Co. Ltd.
